::Grimmler/Ramulus::

Grimmler frowns, looking at Mangus like the bot had been hit in the 
head with something. "Uh.. There have been no shots fired in quite a 
while, I think the battle is over..."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus' eyes widen as he sees Fliq carry Brix behind Mangus.

"Fliq, Brix!" he exclaims, running up to them, "What happened?!"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Magnus saw a few more walk over to him. "I will give you one last 
chance any 
> maximals to get over near me. So I may be able to tell who are the 
emimies 
> here." he turned to Grimmler..and the maximal next to him...the 
oracal shined 
> brightly around him...."If some do not hear me or answer I will 
need one of 
> you to help me make sure I dont hurt any maximals. I have an idea."
